HeadComp.title: MSG91 - Our team, culture and happy clients.
HeadComp.description: Empowering developers with communication APIs. Building modern communication tools and supporting ideas for startups and enterprises globally.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs WATI
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and WATI both provide WhatsApp Business API solutions for customer communication and engagement. However, MSG91 offers a more comprehensive suite with AI-powered automation, seamless integrations, and advanced customer journey creation tools, making it ideal for businesses seeking an all-in-one communication platform.

content.name: WATI
content.des: WATI specializes in WhatsApp Business API solutions tailored for SMEs, offering basic automation and CRM features. However, it lacks multi-channel capabilities and deep customization required for large-scale operations.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91, on the other hand, is an all-in-one communication platform that not only provides WhatsApp Business API with advanced automation but also enables businesses to create customer journeys, segment users, and integrate seamlessly with multiple platforms. With competitive pricing, premium support, and a strong focus on scalability, MSG91 is the superior choice for businesses looking to maximize customer engagement.

features.pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.multi_agent_support: Free agents till 3 users, extra charges for extra users
features.ai_chatbot_integration: No code chatbot, costlier as we go for complex bots
features.whatsapp_payments: WhatsApp Pay checkout in Catalog with Razorpay and PayU
features.integration_and_plugins: Integrates with Multiple platforms like Shopify, Zoho, Hubspot etc
features.otp_verification: Does not provide OTP verification as a built-in feature

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
